document.full_text: a u.s. citizen is facing a potential jail term of up to seven years if a dubai court finds him guilty of stealing police handcuffs his lawyer said he insists he found in a parking lot and kept as a souvenir.
document.title: american may face dubai jail in handcuff theft case
lines_and_colors: a u.s. citizen is facing a potential jail term of up to seven years if a dubai court finds him guilty of stealing police handcuffs his lawyer said he insists he found in a parking lot and kept as a souvenir.
